name: Copterfields
description:
This will be our entry for TOY BOX JAM 3, it's very much a work in progress. You can follow the development in the devlog.

Controls ActionKeyboardGamepadTouchMouseMove
W/S/A/Dleft stick / D-pad
Tap anywhere
Left click anywhere
Pick up / drop block
Space
A button
On-screen button
Right click

Press F to toggle full screen.

Also, for the time being it's possible to move the camera around since we're not completely settled on the camera angle; use the arrow keys to move the camera along the X and Y axes, numpad plus and minus to move it on the Z axis; you can also move the camera target with Shift + arrow
